title: Pretzel and the Puppies
overview: When your dad is the "world's longest dachshund," it puts a whole new twist on growing up! The series follows stay-at-home dad Pretzel, his mayor wife Greta and their five adorable puppies, in their hometown of Muttgomery. They are a modern and unique family who are always sniffing out ways to "make their bark" and make the world a better place for their four-legged friends and neighbors. Pretzel and Greta encourage their pups to try to solve their own problems, often reminding them to "Get those PAWS UP!" when they face a challenge.
